dcterms:creator: M. Yee-King
dcterms:description: A real-time interactive music improviser that takes audio input from a monophonic instrument and produces musical note events to control a synthesizer.
dcterms:title: SpeakeSystem

dcterms:creator: S. Colton
D. Ventura
dcterms:description: An installation that provides real-time interactions with users, where the system explains its processes and motivations while the user guides the creative process.
dcterms:title: You Can’t Know my Mind installation of The Painting Fool

dcterms:creator: S. Colton
M. T. Llano

dcterms:description: A musical project that involved collaboration between human writers and computational creativity systems, highlighting the challenges and experiences of such collaborations.
dcterms:title: Beyond The Fence musical

dcterms:creator: M. Yee-King
dcterms:description: A live human and computer performance commissioned by BBC Radio 3, featuring the SpeakeSystem.
dcterms:title: BBC Radio 3 Jazz Line Up performance
